memberdef.name: SQLITE_LOCKED
memberdef.initializer: 6 /* A table in the database is locked */

memberdef.name: SQLITE_READONLY
memberdef.initializer: 8 /* Attempt to write a readonly database */

memberdef.name: SQLITE_IOERR
memberdef.initializer: 10 /* Some kind of disk I/O error occurred */

memberdef.name: SQLITE_CORRUPT
memberdef.initializer: 11 /* The database disk image is malformed */

memberdef.name: SQLITE_FULL
memberdef.initializer: 13 /* Insertion failed because database is full */

memberdef.name: SQLITE_CANTOPEN
memberdef.initializer: 14 /* Unable to open the database file */

memberdef.name: SQLITE_TOOBIG
memberdef.initializer: 18 /* String or BLOB exceeds size limit */

memberdef.name: SQLITE_NOLFS
memberdef.initializer: 22 /* Uses OS features not supported on host */

memberdef.name: SQLITE_RANGE
memberdef.initializer: 25 /* 2nd parameter to sqlite3_bind out of range */

memberdef.name: SQLITE_NOTADB
memberdef.initializer: 26 /* File opened that is not a database file */

memberdef.name: SQLITE_DENY
memberdef.initializer: 1 /* Abort the SQL statement with an error */

memberdef.name: SQLITE_IGNORE
memberdef.initializer: 2 /* Don't allow access, but don't generate an error */

memberdef.name: SQLITE_CHECKPOINT_PASSIVE
memberdef.initializer: 0 /* Do as much as possible w/o blocking */

memberdef.name: SQLITE_CHECKPOINT_RESTART
memberdef.initializer: 2 /* Like FULL but wait for for readers */

memberdef.name: SQLITE_CHECKPOINT_TRUNCATE
memberdef.initializer: 3 /* Like RESTART but also truncate WAL */

memberdef.name: NOT_WITHIN
memberdef.initializer: 0 /* Object completely outside of query region */

memberdef.name: FULLY_WITHIN
memberdef.initializer: 2 /* Object fully contained within query region */
